```lisp
[
  (:action scrub ; Scrub an item to clean it
    :parameters (?actor - person ?item - object ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?actor ?location) (cleanness ?item dirty))
    :effect (and (cleanness ?item clean) (wetness ?item wet))
  ),
  
  (:action place ; Place an item in a designated location and update its status
    :parameters (?p - person ?item - object ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (available ?item) (not (placed ?item ?loc)))
    :effect (and (placed ?item ?loc) (status ?item updated) (status ?loc updated))
  ),
  
  (:action replace-lid-label
    :parameters (?p - person ?b - bottle ?lid - lid ?label - label)
    :precondition (and (at ?p kitchen) (emptiness ?b full) (cleanness ?b clean) (wetness ?b wet))
    :effect (and (orientation ?b closed_with_lid) (clarity ?b written_on))
  ),
  
  (:action place_in_refrigerator
    :parameters (?p - person ?b - bottle ?r - refrigerator)
    :precondition (and (at ?p kitchen) (orientation ?b closed_with_lid) (clarity ?b written_on))
    :effect (in ?b ?r)
  ),
  
  (:action replace
    :parameters (?p - person ?item - object ?new_state - state ?location - place)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?location) (not (state ?item ?new_state)))
    :effect (and (state ?item ?new_state) (in ?item ?location))
  )
]
```
